sql.query: UPDATE publications as p SET url_path = ( SELECT ps.setting_value FROM publication_settings as ps WHERE ps.publication_id = p.publication_id AND ps.setting_name = 'pub-id::publisher-id' )

UPDATE publication_formats as pf SET url_path = ( SELECT pft.setting_value FROM publication_format_settings as pft WHERE pft.publication_format_id = pf.publication_format_id AND pft.setting_name = 'pub-id::publisher-id' )
